attributes.action: ban nurses from being members of the BNP.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At the very central of nursing is the desire to give high quality and care to all regardless of race, creed, religion, sexulaity and gender. All nurses should subscribe to this value. Being a member of the BNP is against this as they seek exclusion and division. As such no nurse should be allowed to hold registration with the NMC if they are a member of the BNP an organisation that seeks division and exclusion.
